```{r}
# import packages 
library(readxl)
library(car)

# import data
group_membership <- read_excel("data/AllFields with group membership.xlsx")

```

```{r}
summary(group_membership$`4 Group Membership`)
```



```{r}
# Chi-square test
chisq.test(group_membership$Gender, group_membership$`4 Group Membership`)
```
```{r}
table(group_membership$`4 Group Membership`, group_membership$Gender)
```




 Levene's test 
 (assumptions for ANOVA)
```{r}

group_aov <-  lm(group_membership$`4 Group Membership` ~ Age, data = group_membership)
summary(group_aov)
```

```{r}
help(aov)
```
